title: DOJ Blocks Epstein File Releases, Pam Bondi Lies About "Client List"
summary: Department of Justice blocks release of Epstein investigation files while incoming AG Pam Bondi falsely claims there's a "client list" being hidden, continuing years-long cover-up of intelligence operation

sources.title: Epstein client list doesn't exist, DOJ says, walking back theory Bondi promoted
Justice department says no 'client list' exists in Epstein sex trafficking files
DOJ, FBI review finds no Jeffrey Epstein 'client list,' confirms suicide

notes: DOJ cites ongoing investigations to block releases despite Epstein dead since 2019. Bondi claims "client list" exists but investigators confirm no such list found. Pattern of protecting intelligence operation continues. Cover-up spans multiple administrations.
